archimate:Folder.name: Develop Product Offering Catalog
archimate:Folder.documentation: Brief Description Define, update, and remove a product offering catalog. Extended Description Develop Product Offering Catalog defines, updates, and removes a product offering catalog. It associates a product offering and applicable product offering prices with a catalog. The product offering may have been developed by an enterprise or on-boarded from another party. Child of this process Associate Product Offering with Product Offering Catalog Define Product Offering Catalog
